title: CM takes notice of child murder incident in Nawab Town
content:
LAHORE, May 17 (APP):Punjab Chief Minister Sardar Usman Buzdar on Sunday took a strict notice of the child murder incident in Nawab Town and sought a report from Capital City Police Officer CCPO Lahore.
The CM ordered immediate arrest of the accused involved
in the child murder incident.
Usman Buzdar also expressed his heartfelt sympathy and
condolence with family members of the victim child. He
directed that family members of child be provided with justice.
